snippet: The police said they arrested two suspects Tuesday in the disappearance last Thursday of Miss Honduras, María José Alvarado, 19, and her sister Sofía, 23.
abstract: Police in Honduras arrest two suspects in disappearance of Miss Honduras, Maria Jose Alvarado, and her sister Sofia; Plutarco Ruiz, one of the suspects, is the boyfriend of Sofia Alvarado.
lead_paragraph: The police said they arrested two suspects Tuesday in the disappearance last Thursday of Miss Honduras, María José Alvarado, 19, and her sister Sofía, 23.

headline.main: Honduras: 2 Arrested in Disappearance of Miss Honduras and Her Sister
headline.print_headline: Honduras: 2 Arrested in Disappearance of Miss Honduras and Her Sister
